title: RAW DREAM - RAW ROSE QUARTZ CRYSTALS DIFFUSER AND CRYSTAL INFUSED "RAW DREAM" MIST
description: RAW DREAM RAW ROSE QUARTZ CRYSTALS a rose quartz diffuser for your heart The scent synergies of the essential oils of Lavender & lemon together with the rose quartz stones will give you a state of feeling peace of the mind and soul as well as been relaxed. Each stone has been cleared and cleansed under the Mall
cleaned_text: - [SHOP](/) - [GUIDED CRYSTAL MEDITATION](/pages/coming-soon) - & STONES](/pages/let-it-all-be-crystal-clear) - [OUR JOURNEY](/) RAW DREAM RAW ROSE QUARTZ CRYSTALS a rose quartz diffuser for your heart The scent synergies of the essential oils of Lavender & lemon together with the rose quartz stones will give you a state of feeling peace of the mind and soul as well as been relaxed. Each stone has been cleared and cleansed under the Mallorca's sun, in salted water, and is now ready for you and your journey of dreams. The diffuser is great when used for meditation, getting ready for sleep but also your bathroom or living room. 250 g raw rose quartz stone 10 ml organic lavender & lemon essential oil crystal infuse organic oil blend handmade mini ceramic bowl just drop a few drops of the oil over the stones and enjoy! THE ROSE QUARTZ This is the love stone. The crystal to create love all around you, to make you love yourself and forgive. To have healing and kindness in your life. TAKE A MINUTE TO JUST CONNECT WITH YOUR DREAM AND YOUR CRYSTALS Close your eyes and have your crystals close. Feel the energy of white light flowing through you from the top of your head, filling your heart, and all the way to your toes. See your dream and set the intention Dream it - Trust - Let it go Now is the time to just enjoy the journey This is what it is all about Love - energies - the stone 300 g raw rose quartz stone 10 ml organic lemon & lavender essential oil crystal infuse organic oil blend handmade mini ceramic bowl We are all about slow living / no season and put a lot of energy into being sustainable in our way by each product being handmade in our own factory
